item.description:
Create your Robot, there are several models. But watch out for the devastating robot and its gang, dynamite ... and the wickedness of your opponents!
The aim of the game is to win the game by building your own Robot first with 1 Head, 1 Bust, 1 Left Arm, 1 Right Arm, 1 Left Leg, 1 Right Leg.

PREPARATION and VICTORY
Shuffle the deck and place it face down in the center of the table.
During the game, the discard pile (cards played) and the market area (where the Robot-components you have drawn and which cannot be used for your Robot) will be placed on the sides of the deck.
The youngest player starts the game by drawing the top card.
The game ends when a player completes his Robot with the six required Robot-Component cards. If there are no more cards to draw: take all the cards from the discards, from the market and from ALL the deposits, shuffle them and continue the game, repeat this operation until there is a winner.

GAME TURN
Each player during his turn can only perform ONE action from the following:

- Draw a card from the deck showing it to everyone, if the card is a Robot-Component that you don't have, it must be placed in front of you
going to train your Robot, otherwise if it is a Robot-Component you already own, it must be positioned in the market area.
If you lose one or all of the components of your Robot, due to MINI ROBOT DEVASTATOR or BAND of MINI ROBOTS DEVASTATORI cards, you can continue with different components from the previous one, by fishing or buying them on the market at the cost of 3 BOLTS.
The other cards: Bolt, Guard Robot, Mini Robot Devastator and Band of Mini Robots Devastators, must be positioned to the side of your Robot to form an area that we are going to call deposit, and played when you want, in a subsequent turn, when you decide not to draw a card or when you are attacked by an opponent.
If you draw the DYNAMITE card it must be played immediately.

- Use one card from your warehouse: MINI ROBOT DEVASTATOR or BAND of MINI ROBOTS DEVASTATORI to distract the Robot from the opponents or three BOLT cards to purchase a ROBOT-COMPONENTS card from the market.
